meanings.definition: Crassness: lacking sensitivity, refinement, or intelligence
meanings.sent1: The movie's crassness made it difficult to watch.
meanings.sent2: Her crassness in social situations often led to awkward moments.
meanings.sent3: Despite his crassness, he somehow managed to charm everyone at the party.
meanings.sent4: The crassness of his behavior was like a loud alarm in a quiet room.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's crassness towards the students was unforgettable.

meanings.definition: Crassness: a quality of being vulgar or tasteless
meanings.sent1: The crassness of the joke offended many people.
meanings.sent2: His crassness in conversation made others uncomfortable.
meanings.sent3: The crassness of the situation was so absurd, it was almost comical.
meanings.sent4: The crassness of the graffiti on the wall was a stark reminder of disrespect.
meanings.sent5: The crassness of her outfit left a lasting impression on everyone at the event.
